page.title: 18A VINERY IN ST.SAMPSON'S
page.content: 22 children and their teacher visited a vinery and asked the owner the following:- 1.What is the name of the vinery? It is called Waterways Vinery. 2.How big is the vinery? It is 2145 square feet(1460 feet=1acre),and we grow freesias. 3.How many freesias do you grow a year We grow one crop per year. 4.How old is the vinery? 945 feet of vinery was built in 1978 and the adjoining vinery of 1200 feet was bought in October 1982.This part consists of 500 feet built in 1935.500 feet built in 1952.200 feet built in 1974. The freesias are picked, bunched, packed into boxes and sent by plane to markets in the United Kingdom.
